title: So Big - response to her new situation

content.question: In a well-written essay, analyze how Ferber uses literary elements and techniques to convey Selina’s complex response to her new situation.

frqParts.text: In a well-written essay, analyze how Ferber uses literary elements and techniques to convey Selina’s complex response to her new situation.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
